writingDetail.html:
安息吧！Stiver，你永远永远永远地活在我们心中！

Rest in peace, Stiver. You will forever, forever, forever live in our hearts!

在 2024 年 10 月 22 日，经过一个月对无法治愈的胶质母细胞瘤的治疗后，俄文盗版图书网站Flibusta的创始人Stiver 通过安乐死走完了他的一生。

On October 22, 2024, after a month of treatment for incurable glioblastoma, Stiver, the founder of the Russian pirate book website Flibusta, ended his life through euthanasia.

”我是Stiver,我现在在医院里，我患了严重的胶质母细胞瘤。不幸的是，“Flibusta”可能不在运行了，而我也将走完我的一生。谢谢大家，网站让我非常愉快。服务器已经支付了几周的费用，”Stiver于9月23日在Flibusta论坛上发布了该条消息。

“This is Stiver. I’m in the hospital with a glioblastoma of indecent size. Unfortunately, "Flibusta" has possibly ended at this point, as well as myself. Thanks everyone, it was fun. The servers are paid for for a few more weeks,” the admin posted the message on Flibusta’s forum on September 23rd.

Flibusta网站向所有用户免费提供俄语、乌克兰语和白俄罗斯语的书籍，而外文文学作品仅对注册用户开放。这个盗版图书馆由一位自称居住在德国、使用“Stiver”这一昵称的人于2009年10月创建。

Flibusta offered books in Russian, Ukrainian, and Belarusian for free to all users, while foreign literature was available to registered users only. The pirate library was created in October 2009 by a person who claimed to live in Germany and went by the moniker Stiver.

在关闭之前，这个在线图书馆收集了约62万本各种类型的书籍，并拥有超过130万注册用户。

Before the closure, the online library collected around 620 thousand books of various genres and had more than 1.3 million registered users.

看到Zlibrary发布的Stiver去世消息后，我心生触动，并无限缅怀这位伟大而又无名的英雄!正是因为有了您，Stiver，以及和您一样的人们，因为您们致力并奉献于知识免费自由传播，才有了我现在的知识系统。教育没有给予我的，您们给予了。深切感恩与铭记，谢谢您，Stiver！

After seeing the news of Stiver's passing published by Z-Library, I was deeply moved and infinitely mourned this great and anonymous hero! It is precisely because of you,Stiver, and people like you, who are dedicated to and contribute to the free and open dissemination of knowledge, that my current knowledge system exists. What education did not provide me, you gave me. I am deeply grateful and will always remember you, thank you, Stiver!

Zlibrary的公告

亲爱的读者，

Dear readers,

由于我们团队的大多数成员都来自后苏联国家，我们想向 Flibusta 项目的创建者 Stiver 致敬。Flibusta 是一个免费的在线图书馆，提供俄语文学的访问，允许用户之间自由交流文学作品。

Since most of our team is from post-Soviet states, we would like to honor the creator of the Flibusta project, Stiver. Flibusta was a free online library that provided access to Russian-language literature, allowing free exchange of literature among users.

在 2024 年 10 月 22 日，经过一个月对无法治愈的胶质母细胞瘤的治疗后，Stiver 通过安乐死走完了他的一生。

On October 22, 2024, after a month of being treated for glioblastoma, which was unfortunately not curable, Stiver passed away through euthanasia.

今天，我们想纪念 Stiver，他与我们共享提供免费获取知识的目标。与 Flibusta 一样，Z-Library 于 2009 年创建，使命是让每个人都有机会阅读和学习，无论他们的经济状况如何。这位人士能够将他的想法变为现实，创建了一个让书中文字和思想自由流通的地方。

Today we would like to honor the memory of Stiver, who shared the same goal of providing free access to knowledge. Same as Flibusta, Z-Library was created in 2009 with the mission of giving everyone the opportunity to read and learn, regardless of their financial status. This man was able to bring his idea to life and create a place where the words and thoughts captured in books could circulate freely.

我们对失去一位对书籍世界来说真正宝贵的人深感悲痛。他的努力使知识为所有人所用，帮助无数人拓宽了视野，发现新的灵感世界。

We are deeply saddened by the loss of a man who has been a true asset to the book world. His efforts have made knowledge available to all, helping countless people broaden their horizons and discover new worlds of inspiration.

他的记忆将永存于我们心中，作为书面文字无限可能性的象征，一个对所有人真正开放的世界。我们必须继续他传播知识和文化的工作，愿他的善行激励我们所有人。

His memory will live on in our hearts as a symbol of the endless possibilities of the written word, a world that is truly open to all. We must continue his work of spreading knowledge and culture, and may his good deeds inspire us all.

安息吧，Stiver。你通过提供获取知识的途径，使世界变得更美好的贡献是无法估量的！

Rest in peace, Stiver. Your contribution to making the world a better place through access to knowledge is immeasurable!

Stiver的遗言

来源：https://flibusta.site/node/684900

Stiver пишет:
Здравствуйте, вроде бы определилась дата моей смерти. Хочу использовать возможнось assisted suicide, который в Германии теперь разрешен. Если все пойдет по плану, то завтра, в воскресение 20.10. получу смертельную дозу тиопентала. Если не отпишусь в понедельник, значит сработало :) Просьба тогда во вторник опубликовать эту информацию - для истории и чтобы остановить любые сборы "на помощь Стиверу".

英文翻译

Hello,
It seems that the date of my death has been determined. I want to use the opportunity for assisted suicide, which is now permitted in Germany. If everything goes according to plan, then tomorrow, on Sunday, October 20th, I will receive a lethal dose of thiopental. If I don't write back on Monday, it means it worked :) Please then publish this information on Tuesday—for the record and to stop any collections "to help Stiver."

中文翻译

你好，似乎我的死亡日期已经确定。在德国，协助自杀是被允许的，因此我想利用这种可能性来结束我的生命。如果一切按计划进行，明天，也就是10月20日星期天，我将接受致命剂量的硫喷妥钠。如果我周一没有回复，那就意味着成功了 :) 请在周二发布这条信息——为了历史记录，也为了阻止任何“帮助斯蒂弗”的募捐活动。

Flibusta 网站介绍

Flibusta (Russian: Флибуста) is a shadow library project mainly for Russian language books. Its collection comprised over 630,000 books.

Flibusta（俄语：Флибуста）是一个主要针对俄语书籍的影子图书馆项目。其藏书超过63万本。

Dissatisfied with the commercialization of Librusec, Russia's main shadow library, the website was established by a group of volunteers in October 2009. The founder and administrator of the site was known as "Stiver", who lived in Germany.

由于对俄罗斯主要影子图书馆Librusec商业化的不满，一群志愿者于2009年10月建立了该网站。该网站的创始人兼管理员被称为“Stiver”，他居住在德国。

The website had been the subject of legal action by Russian publishing houses on several occasions. German police investigated Stiver for two years but took no action against him in 2016. In 2016, the site was blocked in Russia according to a Moscow City Court's ruling.

该网站曾多次成为俄罗斯出版商提起法律诉讼的对象。德国警方对Stiver进行了两年的调查，但在2016年未对他采取任何行动。2016年，根据莫斯科市法院的裁决，该网站在俄罗斯被封锁。

In 2024, Stiver announced the closure of the site soon due to his terminal illness.On 2024-10-20, Stiever ended his life through assisted suicide.

2024年，Stiver因晚期疾病宣布将很快关闭该网站。2024年10月20日Stiver通过安乐死结束了自己的生命。

写在最后

从2018年11月25日11:07有记录以来，我在Z-library上下载图书超过2432本，读完图书至少超过300本。我想起一句话“我要这天再也遮不住我的眼，我要这地再也埋不了我的心”。

Stiver，Z-Library的团队成员们，以及每一位致力于知识知识免费自由传播的你们，你们做到了，地球上的每一位干枯的无知的而又热爱阅读的心灵因为你们而变得丰盈！

安息吧！Stiver。你们永远永远永远地活在我们心中！(易北者2024年10月27日16:03)

Since the record on November 25, 2018, at 11:07, I have downloaded over 2,432 books from Z-library and have finished reading at least 300 books. A quote comes to mind: “I want this sky to no longer hide my eyes, I want this earth to no longer bury my heart.”

Stiver, the members of the Z-Library team, and every one of you who are dedicated to the free and open dissemination of knowledge, you have achieved it. Every dry, ignorant, and yet book-loving soul on Earth has been enriched because of you!

Rest in peace, Stiver. You will forever, forever, forever live in our hearts!（YibeiZhe, October 27, 2024, 16:01, Sunday）
